title: How reliable is Trane XV95 gas furnace compared to other brands? - Quora

response.answer_text: I really don’t like to go with brand as much as the installation contractor. It is crucial to get a competent installation contractor who do it right over the brand. You can buy the best brand named air conditioner or gas furnace available but if it is installed incorrectly it will not give you the same efficiency or longevity as a system that was installed correctly. Trane Gas Furnace Reviews | Consumer Ratings Opinions

Train is good quality. What you want is a unit with a lifetime firebox guarantee. The problem with a furnace is it can contaminate the air with CO if the fire box cracks. And they do. Black soot usually covers everything eventually. CO detectors are mandatory with any hot air system.
